abstract: Here’s how the four senators running for president are handling a civic obligation they can’t postpone.
lead_paragraph: Last January, Representative Rashida Tlaib of Michigan exploded onto the national political scene with her expletive-laden cry to impeach President Trump. A little more than a year later, senators arrived in their chamber today to somberly sign an oath to deliver “impartial justice” in Mr. Trump’s impeachment trial.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
